Je m'excuse je peut lire le francais mais, m'expresser en francais est difficile.

Im having a hard time with the 3rd section on the Instructions. When i click on Activation, a box pops up saying "Antidote HD vx (Universal Patcher)". There are a few numbered things but on the 5th number there is a box where you would have the option to write something or use what it there to "appliquer" or "restaurer".

What is already in my box is this "antido32.exe". When i click on either "appliquer" or "restaurer" saying that antido32.exe was not found.. im not sure where or when i went wrong but i really need this program..
any help would be greatly appreciated

-Thanks

@meag-xx You basically just have to put the location of antido32.exe with that program.

You don't touch anything else and click Appliquer. When done, it should display "desactive" on the 3 things. If that's what it shows, then you're good to go. Just open antidote, put some random numbers and name for registration and click okay!

If you want, you can even update and then repatch again after, it'll work, I tried.

Hope that clears it up for you!

Good luck!
merci
